Functions.html#/c:@F@HereSDKMapRectMake.name: HereSDKMapRectMake
Functions.html#/c:@F@HereSDKMapRectMake.abstract: Creates a new HereSDKMapRect from the given origin coordinates and size dimensions.

Functions.html#/c:@F@HereSDKMapRectEqual.name: HereSDKMapRectEqualToRect
Functions.html#/c:@F@HereSDKMapRectEqual.abstract: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the two HereSDKMapRect objects are equal (in both size and location)

Functions.html#/c:@F@HereSDKMapRectGetMi.name: HereSDKMapRectGetMinLongitude
Functions.html#/c:@F@HereSDKMapRectGetMi.abstract: Returns minimum longitude of the specified HereSDKMapRect

Functions.html#/c:@F@HereSDKMapRectGetMi.name: HereSDKMapRectGetMinLatitude
Functions.html#/c:@F@HereSDKMapRectGetMi.abstract: Returns minimum latitude of the specified HereSDKMapRect

Functions.html#/c:@F@HereSDKMapRectGetMi.name: HereSDKMapRectGetMidLongitude
Functions.html#/c:@F@HereSDKMapRectGetMi.abstract: Returns the mid-point longitude of the specified HereSDKMapRect

Functions.html#/c:@F@HereSDKMapRectGetMi.name: HereSDKMapRectGetMidLatitude
Functions.html#/c:@F@HereSDKMapRectGetMi.abstract: Returns the midPoint latitude of the specified HereSDKMapRect

Functions.html#/c:@F@HereSDKMapRectGetMa.name: HereSDKMapRectGetMaxLongitude
Functions.html#/c:@F@HereSDKMapRectGetMa.abstract: Returns maximum longitude of the specified HereSDKMapRect

Functions.html#/c:@F@HereSDKMapRectGetMa.name: HereSDKMapRectGetMaxLatitude
Functions.html#/c:@F@HereSDKMapRectGetMa.abstract: Returns maximum latitude of the specified HereSDKMapRect

Functions.html#/c:@F@HereSDKMapRectGetWi.name: HereSDKMapRectGetWidth
Functions.html#/c:@F@HereSDKMapRectGetWi.abstract: Returns the width of the specified HereSDKMapRect

Functions.html#/c:@F@HereSDKMapRectGetHe.name: HereSDKMapRectGetHeight
Functions.html#/c:@F@HereSDKMapRectGetHe.abstract: Returns the height of the specified HereSDKMapRect

Functions.html#/c:@F@HereSDKMapRectIsVal.name: HereSDKMapRectIsValid
Functions.html#/c:@F@HereSDKMapRectIsVal.abstract: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the HereSDKMapRect is valid

Functions.html#/c:@F@HereSDKMapRectGetCe.name: HereSDKMapRectGetCenter
Functions.html#/c:@F@HereSDKMapRectGetCe.abstract: Returns CLLocationCoordinate2D that represents the center of the HereSDKMapRect.

Type Definitions.html#/c:HereSDKMapServi.name: HereSDKGeocodeCompletionHandler
Type Definitions.html#/c:HereSDKMapServi.abstract: A block to be called to handle a geocoding response.

Protocols/HereSDKMapViewDelegate.html#/c.name: -mapView:didUpdateUserLocationAnnotation:
Protocols/HereSDKMapViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Update that user location was updated on mapview

Protocols/HereSDKMapViewDelegate.html#/c.name: -mapView:didRecognizeLongPressGestureForLocation:
Protocols/HereSDKMapViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Update that mapview recognized a long press gesture

Protocols/HereSDKMapViewDelegate.html#/c.name: -mapView:didTapLocation:
Protocols/HereSDKMapViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Update that mapview recognized a tap gesture

Protocols/HereSDKMapViewDelegate.html#/c.name: -mapView:didTapAnnotation:
Protocols/HereSDKMapViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Tells the receiver an annotation was tapped

Protocols/HereSDKMapViewDelegate.html#/c.name: -mapView:didLongTapAnnotation:
Protocols/HereSDKMapViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Tells the receiver an annotation was long tapped

Protocols/HereSDKMapViewDelegate.html#/c.name: -mapView:annotationCanShowCallout:
Protocols/HereSDKMapViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the annotation is able to display extra information in a callout bubble.

Protocols/HereSDKMapViewDelegate.html#/c.name: -mapView:calloutViewForAnnotation:
Protocols/HereSDKMapViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Returns a callout view to display for the given annotation.

Protocols/HereSDKMapViewDelegate.html#/c.name: -mapView:didSelectAnnotation:
Protocols/HereSDKMapViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Tells the receiver an annotation was selected and presented its view on the map

Protocols/HereSDKMapViewDelegate.html#/c.name: -mapView:didDeselectAnnotation:
Protocols/HereSDKMapViewDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Tells the receiver an annotation was deselected and its view on the map was hidden

Protocols/HereSDKAnnotation.html.name: HereSDKAnnotation
Protocols/HereSDKAnnotation.html.abstract: An abstract class that represents an annotation object.

Enums/HereSDKRouteLegManeuverAction.html.name: HereSDKRouteLegManeuverActionRoundAbout
Enums/HereSDKRouteLegManeuverAction.html.abstract: Maneuver action: roundabout (NOTE: Roundabouts are smaller than traffic circles, and meant to be driven through at lower speeds.)

Enums/HereSDKPolylineCapStyle.html#/c:@E.name: HereSDKPolylineCapStyleButt
Enums/HereSDKPolylineCapStyle.html#/c:@E.abstract: The line ends with a straight line, at its end vertex

Enums/HereSDKPolylineCapStyle.html#/c:@E.name: HereSDKPolylineCapStyleSquare
Enums/HereSDKPolylineCapStyle.html#/c:@E.abstract: The line ends with a straight line, half its width

Enums/HereSDKPolylineCapStyle.html#/c:@E.name: HereSDKPolylineCapStyleRound
Enums/HereSDKPolylineCapStyle.html#/c:@E.abstract: The line ends with a semicircle around its end vertex

Enums/HereSDKPolylineWidthUnits.html#/c:.name: HereSDKPolylineWidthUnitsPoints
Enums/HereSDKPolylineWidthUnits.html#/c:.abstract: The width of polylines is in points

Enums/HereSDKPolylineWidthUnits.html#/c:.name: HereSDKPolylineWidthUnitsMeters
Enums/HereSDKPolylineWidthUnits.html#/c:.abstract: The width of polylines is in meters, and changes in proportion with the map.

Enums/HereSDKMapCompassVisibility.html#/.name: HereSDKMapCompassVisibilityWhenRotated
Enums/HereSDKMapCompassVisibility.html#/.abstract: Compass indicator is visible when the mapView’s rotation

Enums/HereSDKMapCompassPosition.html#/c:.name: HereSDKMapCompassPositionTopRight
Enums/HereSDKMapCompassPosition.html#/c:.abstract: Compass position in the top right corner of the view

Enums/HereSDKMapCompassPosition.html#/c:.name: HereSDKMapCompassPositionTopLeft

Enums/HereSDKMapCompassPosition.html#/c:.name: HereSDKMapCompassPositionBottomLeft

Enums/HereSDKMapCompassPosition.html#/c:.name: HereSDKMapCompassPositionBottomRight
Enums/HereSDKMapCompassPosition.html#/c:.abstract: Compass position in the bottom right corner of the view

Enums/HereSDKGeocodeResultType.html#/c:@.name: HereSDKGeocodeResultTypeAddress
Enums/HereSDKGeocodeResultType.html#/c:@.abstract: Geocode Result type: Address (e.g. 121 Main Street, Smithsville, CA 20289, USA)

Enums/HereSDKAnnotationAnchor.html#/c:@E.name: HereSDKAnnotationAnchorTopLeft
Enums/HereSDKAnnotationAnchor.html#/c:@E.abstract: The styling will be anchor top left.

Enums/HereSDKAnnotationAnchor.html#/c:@E.name: HereSDKAnnotationAnchorTopRight
Enums/HereSDKAnnotationAnchor.html#/c:@E.abstract: The styling will be anchor top right.

Enums/HereSDKAnnotationAnchor.html#/c:@E.name: HereSDKAnnotationAnchorBottomLeft
Enums/HereSDKAnnotationAnchor.html#/c:@E.abstract: The styling will be anchor bottom left.

Enums/HereSDKAnnotationAnchor.html#/c:@E.name: HereSDKAnnotationAnchorBottomRight
Enums/HereSDKAnnotationAnchor.html#/c:@E.abstract: The styling will be anchor bottom right.

Enums/HereSDKAnnotationAnchor.html.name: HereSDKAnnotationAnchor
Enums/HereSDKAnnotationAnchor.html.abstract: Options for the location of the HereSDKAnnotationAnchor.

Enums/HereSDKGeocodeResultType.html.name: HereSDKGeocodeResultType
Enums/HereSDKGeocodeResultType.html.abstract: Type definition for of geocoding result types

Enums/HereSDKMapCompassPosition.html.abstract: Position of the compass indicator in the map view.

Enums/HereSDKMapCompassVisibility.html.name: HereSDKMapCompassVisibility
Enums/HereSDKMapCompassVisibility.html.abstract: Visibility of the compass indicator in the map view.

Enums/HereSDKMapAnimationCurve.html.name: HereSDKMapAnimationCurve
Enums/HereSDKMapAnimationCurve.html.abstract: Animation curve type to be used when animating map properties

Enums/HereSDKPolylineCapStyle.html.name: HereSDKPolylineCapStyle
Enums/HereSDKPolylineCapStyle.html.abstract: Type definitions for the style of the polyline’s ends.

Enums/HereSDKPolylineJoinStyle.html.name: HereSDKPolylineJoinStyle
Enums/HereSDKPolylineJoinStyle.html.abstract: Type definitions for the style of the polyline’s corners.

Enums/HereSDKRouteLegManeuverDirection.h.name: HereSDKRouteLegManeuverDirection
Enums/HereSDKRouteLegManeuverDirection.h.abstract: The direction of the maneuver action. For turns, it represents the turn direction.

Enums/HereSDKRouteProfile.html.name: HereSDKRouteProfile
Enums/HereSDKRouteProfile.html.abstract: The type of transport to to use en route

Classes/HereSDKRouteRequest.html#/c:objc.name: points
Classes/HereSDKRouteRequest.html#/c:objc.abstract: An array of points used for the route request

Classes/HereSDKRouteRequest.html#/c:objc.name: requestAlternativeRoutes
Classes/HereSDKRouteRequest.html#/c:objc.abstract: A Boolean flag indicating whether multiple routes should be produced for the route request if available.

Classes/HereSDKRouteRequest.html#/c:objc.name: routeProfile
Classes/HereSDKRouteRequest.html#/c:objc.abstract: The type of transport to which the route should apply

Classes/HereSDKRouteRequest.html#/c:objc.name: language
Classes/HereSDKRouteRequest.html#/c:objc.abstract: BCP47 language code to use for text instructions. An error is returned if there are no matching supported languages. Optional; defaults to en-us.

Classes/HereSDKRouteRequest.html#/c:objc.name: -initWithPoints:
Classes/HereSDKRouteRequest.html#/c:objc.abstract: Return the route request object that contains at least two locations (the start and end points) of the route. This parameter must not be nil.

Classes/HereSDKRouteRequest.html#/c:objc.name: -initWithStart:andEnd:
Classes/HereSDKRouteRequest.html#/c:objc.abstract: Return the route request object that contains the start destination and end destination of the route. Those parameters must not be nil.

Classes/HereSDKRoutePoint.html#/c:objc(c.name: zLevel
Classes/HereSDKRoutePoint.html#/c:objc(c.abstract: Indicates the vertical stacking of points that reside at the same latitude and longitude. Optional.

Classes/HereSDKRouteManeuver.html#/c:obj.name: distance
Classes/HereSDKRouteManeuver.html#/c:obj.abstract: Distance of the leg (in the units requested in HereSDKRouteRequest)

Classes/HereSDKRouteManeuver.html#/c:obj.name: travelTime
Classes/HereSDKRouteManeuver.html#/c:obj.abstract: Estimated travel time for the leg, in seconds

Classes/HereSDKRouteManeuver.html#/c:obj.name: firstPointIndex
Classes/HereSDKRouteManeuver.html#/c:obj.abstract: Index of the first point of the leg in the route geometry

Classes/HereSDKRouteManeuver.html#/c:obj.name: lastPointIndex
Classes/HereSDKRouteManeuver.html#/c:obj.abstract: Index of the last point of the leg in the route geometry

Classes/HereSDKRouteManeuver.html#/c:obj.name: instruction
Classes/HereSDKRouteManeuver.html#/c:obj.abstract: Instruction text, e.g. Turn right onto Main Street

Classes/HereSDKRouteManeuver.html#/c:obj.name: direction
Classes/HereSDKRouteManeuver.html#/c:obj.abstract: The maneuver direction. For turns, this is the turn direction.

Classes/HereSDKRouteManeuver.html#/c:obj.name: roundaboutExitNumber
Classes/HereSDKRouteManeuver.html#/c:obj.abstract: For roundabouts or traffic circles, indicates the number of the exit to take. A value of 0 means that exit information is not available and should not be used.

Classes/HereSDKRouteManeuver.html#/c:obj.name: roadsNumberArray
Classes/HereSDKRouteManeuver.html#/c:obj.abstract: Primary road numbers, if available, of the maneuver

Classes/HereSDKRouteManeuver.html#/c:obj.name: signsInfoArray
Classes/HereSDKRouteManeuver.html#/c:obj.abstract: Sign text indicating the direction a driver should follow.

Classes/HereSDKRouteManeuver.html#/c:obj.name: exitsInfoArray
Classes/HereSDKRouteManeuver.html#/c:obj.abstract: The number of items in @c signInfoArray without causing the array to be created.

Classes/HereSDKRouteLeg.html#/c:objc(cs).name: distance
Classes/HereSDKRouteLeg.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Distance of the leg (in the units requested in HereSDKRouteRequest)

Classes/HereSDKRouteLeg.html#/c:objc(cs).name: travelTime
Classes/HereSDKRouteLeg.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Estimated travel time for the leg, in seconds

Classes/HereSDKRouteLeg.html#/c:objc(cs).name: firstPointIndex
Classes/HereSDKRouteLeg.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Index of the first point of the leg in the route geometry

Classes/HereSDKRouteLeg.html#/c:objc(cs).name: lastPointIndex
Classes/HereSDKRouteLeg.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Index of the last point of the leg in the route’s polyline

Classes/HereSDKRouteLeg.html#/c:objc(cs).name: maneuvers
Classes/HereSDKRouteLeg.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: Maneuvers (turns, exits, etc.) in a leg of the route

Classes/HereSDKRoute.html#/c:objc(cs)Her.name: distance
Classes/HereSDKRoute.html#/c:objc(cs)Her.abstract: Distance of the entire route (in the units requested in HereSDKRouteRequest)

Classes/HereSDKRoute.html#/c:objc(cs)Her.name: travelTime
Classes/HereSDKRoute.html#/c:objc(cs)Her.abstract: Estimated travel time for the entire route, in seconds

Classes/HereSDKRoute.html#/c:objc(cs)Her.name: language
Classes/HereSDKRoute.html#/c:objc(cs)Her.abstract: BCP47 compliant language code to use for text instructions. An error is returned if there are no matching supported languages. Optional; defaults to en-us.

Classes/HereSDKPolylineStyle.html#/c:obj.name: width
Classes/HereSDKPolylineStyle.html#/c:obj.abstract: Width of the feature. Default unit is points and default value is 5.

Classes/HereSDKPolylineStyle.html#/c:obj.name: widthUnits
Classes/HereSDKPolylineStyle.html#/c:obj.abstract: Units for width of polyline. Default is HereSDKPolylineWidthUnitsPoints.

Classes/HereSDKPolylineStyle.html#/c:obj.name: capStyle
Classes/HereSDKPolylineStyle.html#/c:obj.abstract: Cap style for the polyline. Default is HereSDKPolylineCapStyleButt.

Classes/HereSDKPolylineStyle.html#/c:obj.name: joinStyle
Classes/HereSDKPolylineStyle.html#/c:obj.abstract: Join style for the polyline. Default is HereSDKPolylineJoinStyleMiter.

Classes/HereSDKPolylineStyle.html#/c:obj.name: miterLimit
Classes/HereSDKPolylineStyle.html#/c:obj.abstract: Miter limit for the polyline’s joins. Applied if the joinStyle is HereSDKPolylineJoinStyleMiter,

Classes/HereSDKPolyline.html#/c:objc(cs).name: +polylineWithPoints:
Classes/HereSDKPolyline.html#/c:objc(cs).abstract: This function generates a polyline from the given point list.

Classes/HereSDKPolygon.html#/c:objc(cs)H.abstract: This function generates a polygon from the given point list.

Classes/HereSDKPointAnnotationStyle.html.name: radius
Classes/HereSDKPointAnnotationStyle.html.abstract: Radius of the point annotation in points.

Classes/HereSDKPointAnnotationStyle.html.name: borderWidth
Classes/HereSDKPointAnnotationStyle.html.abstract: Width in points of the point annotation outline. Default is 0.

Classes/HereSDKPointAnnotation.html#/c:o.abstract: Creates a new HereSDKPointAnnotation instance with the given coordinates.

Classes/HereSDKMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)H.abstract: The geographic coordinates at the center of the map view.

Classes/HereSDKMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)H.name: -setZoom:animated:

Classes/HereSDKMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)H.name: rotation

Classes/HereSDKMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)H.name: -setRotation:animated:
Classes/HereSDKMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)H.abstract: Changes the rotation of the map and optionally animates the change.

Classes/HereSDKMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)H.name: maxTilt
Classes/HereSDKMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)H.abstract: The max tilt angle of the map camera, measured in radians. Default is 1.309 radians (75 degrees).

Classes/HereSDKMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)H.name: -setMaxTilt:animated:
Classes/HereSDKMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)H.abstract: Changes the maximum tilt angle of the map camera, measured in radians.

Classes/HereSDKMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)H.name: tilt
Classes/HereSDKMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)H.abstract: The tilt angle of the map camera, measured in radians from the 0 direction (0 direction = camera is facing the ground).

Classes/HereSDKMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)H.name: -setTilt:animated:
Classes/HereSDKMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)H.abstract: Changes the tilt angle of the map camera, and optionally animates the change.

Classes/HereSDKMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)H.name: zoomEnabled
Classes/HereSDKMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)H.abstract: A Boolean value that determines whether the user may zoom the map in and

Classes/HereSDKMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)H.name: tiltEnabled
Classes/HereSDKMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)H.abstract: A Boolean value that determines whether the user may tilt the map back and forth, changing the tilt level.

Classes/HereSDKMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)H.name: rotationEnabled
Classes/HereSDKMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)H.abstract: A Boolean value that determines whether the user may rotate the map, changing the rotation level.

Classes/HereSDKMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)H.name: scrollEnabled
Classes/HereSDKMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)H.abstract: A Boolean value that determines whether the user may drag/scroll the map, changing the map region.

Classes/HereSDKImageAnnotationStyle.html.name: image

Classes/HereSDKGeocodeResult.html#/c:obj.name: resultId
Classes/HereSDKGeocodeResult.html#/c:obj.abstract: Opaque ID of the result in the response list. Required.

Classes/HereSDKGeocodeResult.html#/c:obj.name: title
Classes/HereSDKGeocodeResult.html#/c:obj.abstract: Title of the result to display to the end user. Always provided for place results; optional otherwise.

Classes/HereSDKGeocodeResult.html#/c:obj.name: address
Classes/HereSDKGeocodeResult.html#/c:obj.abstract: Address information for the result. Always provided for address results; optional otherwise.

Classes/HereSDKGeocodeResult.html#/c:obj.name: addressId
Classes/HereSDKGeocodeResult.html#/c:obj.abstract: URI that refers to a resource with details for the result (e.g. the location’s web site). Optional.

Classes/HereSDKGeocodeResult.html#/c:obj.name: addressData
Classes/HereSDKGeocodeResult.html#/c:obj.abstract: Data object that represents detailed data about an address. Optional.

Classes/HereSDKFeatureStyle.html#/c:objc.abstract: Fill color of the feature. Default is UIColor.blueColor.

Classes/HereSDKFeatureStyle.html#/c:objc.name: borderWidth
Classes/HereSDKFeatureStyle.html#/c:objc.abstract: Width in points of the feature outline. Default is 0.

Classes/HereSDKAnnotationStyle.html#/c:o.name: tintColor

Classes/HereSDKAnnotationStyle.html#/c:o.name: flat
